label: typeExtensionCode
comment: The code used as an extension to the type code for further specifying a type of supply chain trade line item.
The code used as an extension to the type code for further specifying the type of referenced supply chain consignment item.
The code used as an extension to the type code for further specifying the type of supply chain consignment item.

domainIncludes.comment: An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for trade purposes.
